summary: Tanvi left today, so I was alone. I did nothing productive—only responded to OLX applications but got no calls. I need to focus on what I can control to move forward. Reflected on jobs and priorities; I should learn video editing for uploads. Must fix my broken daily routine.

wins: Talked to my father after a long time (was ignoring him earlier)
Stable mood—recovered quickly from interview-related stress
losses: Expected interview selection but didn’t get it
ideas: Create a YouTube channel to practice video editing (long-term skill with no downside)
Consistent uploads will help build a valuable skill

triggerEvents: YouTube channel videos not getting picked by algorithm
symptomChecklist: Elevated mood (feeling more positive than usual, possibly above baseline)
